HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!A hot patch is usually due to clots in deep veins or deep vein thrombosis. This is usually diagnosed by vascular dopplar studies, CT angiogram or by simple angiogram. The other possibility is an eczema or a dermatitis.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Please consult your PCP and get proper referrals for diagnosis and treatment. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
